enhanced_by.reason: Setting the old security requirement should be tested in conjunction with setting the new security requirement to ensure state consistency.
Adding missing security requirements should be tested before setting the old security requirement to ensure proper state handling.
The method to retrieve the old security requirement can be used to verify the correctness of the setOldSecurityRequirement method.
The equals method can be used to compare the old security requirement before and after setting it to ensure the change is correctly applied.
